name: Pa Pa O Ma Ma
content: Pa pa ooh mow mow pa pa ooh mow mow
劲度足他声线就如着了火
Pa pa pa pa pa pa ooh
Pa pa ooh mow mow pa pa ooh mow mow
做劲 show 使观众着迷着了魔
当他开声唱一唱他的怪歌
Pa pa pa pa pa pa ooh
Pa pa ooh mow mow pa pa ooh mow mow
Pa pa ooh mow mow pa pa ooh mow mow
实在几多岁亦能共唱歌
活在 rock 之中 没人话你傻
Pa pa pa pa pa pa ooh
Pa pa ooh mow mow pa pa ooh mow mow
Pa pa ooh mow mow pa pa ooh mow mow
